content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I love music! I play the flute in the school band.
That's awesome! I'm in art school and I love painting.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of paintings do you like to do?
I like to paint murals and acrylics are my favorite medium.
Acrylics are really fun to work with! I love the way they blend.
Me too! I'm so glad you like music! My mom is my favorite person of all people and she's always played music for me. It's one of my favorite things to do with her.
That's so sweet! My mom is also my favorite person. She's always been there for me and I know I can always count on her.
I'm glad you have a good relationship with your mom. I know how lucky I am to have mine.
Me too! I'm sure we'll both cherish our moms for the rest of our lives.
It's nice to meet you! I'm sure we'll be friends.
It's nice to meet you too! I'm sure we will too.
